_sText:
THE MAP HAS BEEN UPDATED FOR A LITTLE BIT MORE BALANCYNESS
V2: And a little bit more bot balance

Dm_dustarena is a very simple and short map created in two hours. After all, this is my first CS:S map. I just got CS:S one day ago, and I would like to make a map.

The game:

You start out in a trapped area, and you have ten seconds to buy your stuff. (That is long enough for noobs or newcomers to buy stuff.)

Then The platform is raised, and people fight to the death.

There are four special spawn areas, and you might be spawning there.


So yeah.

Simple, fun, and etc.


UP TO 24 PLAYERS, or something might happen if you have 32.

I only had good room for 24 ppl playing.
